>  // TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
>  TestSuite sui = new TestSuite();  // fun name and variable must be
> different ..

?!?  you're entirely free to name your variable 'suite'.

>       public static Test suite(){
>             TestSuite suite=new TestSuite();
>             suite.addTest(OverviewTest.suite());
>             
>             return suite();
                          ^^ recursive call !
>       }

a simple 'return suite' will solve the problem.

-Vladimir
